name: Switch to more Qualified Agent
description: Switches to a more qualified agent.

name: Check Helper Agent Chat Summaries
description: Checks the helper agent chat summaries.

name: Switch back to Supervisor Agent
description: Switches back to the supervisor agent.

name: Run Wolfram Alpha API Tool
description: Connects to the Wolfram Alpha API.

name: Create File in Linux Environment
description: Creates a file in the agent's Linux environment.

name: Run Command in Linux Environment
description: Runs a command in the agent's Linux environment.

name: Run Code Snippet in Linux Environment
description: Runs a code snippet in the agent's Linux environment.

name: Get Current Date
description: Gets the current (UTC) date as an ISO formatted string.

name: Generate Image and Show it to User
description: Generates an image and shows it to the user.

name: View Schedule
description: View the events in the user's schedule.

name: Add New Event to Schedule
description: Adds a new event to the user's schedule.

name: Remove Event with ID from Schedule
description: Removes the event with the given ID from the user's schedule.

name: Modify Event in Schedule
description: Modifies an event in the user's schedule.
